explains: adj. 感官的，愉悦感官的；肉欲的，性感的；喜爱感官享受（尤指情欲）的

sentences.en: He was a very sensual person.
sentences.cn: 他是个非常喜爱感官享受的人。

sentences.en: It was an opera, very glamorous and very sensual.
sentences.cn: 那是一部极富魅力，让人感官非常愉悦的歌剧。

sentences.en: The book brings a sensual pleasure.
sentences.cn: 这本书带来一种感官上的愉悦。
